Posts.Content: Hi Dolina. Your're aloud to have down days . It would be odd if you didn't have times you just feel down. I am about to start my Chemo and this is a first for me . So sorry you have had operation after operation. That must be a drain. I went to see the chemo room last week and the atmosphere there was really warm and friendly. I felt less anxious once I'd seen where it all happened. You are right when you say how odd it seems to feel fine until you go to hospital. That's how I feel now. Fit as a flea and then Chemo may make me feel unwell. We'll see but I really value being able to hear your experiences and wish you all the best with your treatment. Often the fear and anticipation is worse than the reality. Xx
Posts.Title: Can anyone help me please with lymph node question please.

Posts.Content: Yes I have just started the docetaxel and have black nail varnish because I have heard it stops the uv and this is what damage he nails when on this treatment. Not sue if it will work but worth a go. Good luck. X
Posts.Title: Black nail varnish & Docetaxel

Posts.Content: Hello Catherine, I start the T part of my chemotherapy on the 18th and feeling anxious. Like you I mostly sailed through the FEC part and am dreading this unknown medication. Hopefully it will be manageable and I won't feel too tired or sick. Thanks for your post it was helpful. Good luck with the rest of your treatment. X
